metadata.inclusion:
1. Insert 3 AA batteries into the battery compartment with correct polarity
2. CO-8 will emit a 2-tone beep
3. Press the Function Button 3 times within 1.5 seconds
4. CO-8 will emit another 2-tone beep
metadata.exclusion: Press the Function Button 3 times within 1.5 seconds. The Carbon Monoxide Detector will be removed from the Z-Wave network.
metadata.reset:
1. Remove the batteries from the Carbon Monoxide Detector
2. Press and hold the Test Button
3. While holding the Test Button, re-insert the batteries
4. Wait for 10 seconds to complete factory reset
